Game.Name: Bomber Man Story (Japan)
Game.plot: An S.O.S. from the cosmos signals that planet Phantarion is in trouble! Grab your arsenal and get ready for non-stop action as you blast your way through interactive battlefields and take on up to 4 real-time players. Battle opponents through 8 interactive battlefield mazes! Take on up to 4 players in multi-player blastfests! Fast, furious, explosive bombing adventure!Cheat: use elekong in muiltiplayer modeYou must have elekong to do this. Go into a base and equip elekong. Then, save. Next, kill yourself and when the game asks you if you want to continue, quit. Go into muiltiplayer mode and play. You will be able to walk through blocks if you did this correctly.
